title.narrative: Procurement of Services for Supporting DFID's partnership with China on International Development, covering a range of Millennium Development Goals sectors.

description.narrative: This activity (Procurement of Services for Supporting DFID's partnership with China on International Development, covering a range of Millennium Development Goals sectors.) is a component of International Development Support Project reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,785,977. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Family planning, Water sector policy and administrative management, Public sector policy and administrative management, Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution, Trade policy and administrative management, Promotion of development awareness (non-sector allocable). , with the following implementing partners: DAI Europe, IMC Worldwide, Institute of Development Studies, LTS International Ltd, Overseas Development Institute, Oxford Policy Management, United Nations Research Institute For Social Development (UNRISD). The start date is 01-01-2012 and the end date is 31-12-2021.

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Research Institute For Social Development (UNRISD)

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
